quotes: He served as European Commissioner for Development and Humanitarian Aid from 2004 until 2009.
Michel is a prominent member of the French-speaking liberal party, the Mouvement Réformateur, and served as Belgium’s Foreign Minister and Deputy Prime Minister from 1999 to July 2004.
